TopicTitle: Any MC players looking to join a server?

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I am starting a multiplayer server hosting business, and I currently host a minecraft server.

If anyone is interested in joining, please click this link leading to the minecraft forum post for our server so that you may read the rules.

http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/629764-aquor-servershosting-survival-gameplay-version-11/

Check out our Facebook page too!

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Aquor-Servers/314876171884322?sk=wall

See you soon!
